The Elder Punnaga Flower’s Birth Story
“Having gone to the forest, the grove,
Having made a shrine on the bank,
I offered it to the Buddha.
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
there was one who removed darkness,
I have done what the Buddha asked.”🔽Thus the elder Punnaga Flower recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā punnāgapupphiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Punnāgapupphiyattherassāpadānaṁ navamaṁ.
